metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4001 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: [race condition when the EBPF map is frozen] It was discovered that the eBPF implementation in the Linux kernel contained a race condition around read-only maps. A privileged attacker could use this to modify read-only maps.
